meaningMnemonic: Under this <radical>roof</radical> you <radical>jackhammer</radical> your <kanji>religion</kanji> into people.
readingMnemonic: Your <kanji>religion</kanji> requires everyone to take off their <reading>shoe</reading>s (しゅう). Mostly because the shoes will help them resist the jackhammering, so you tell them that to join your religion they have to leave their shoes at the door.
